ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] My bow staff thinggy?
ygData.msgSnippet: Fletching can be fun but it takes a lot of money, you can find more information on fletching and other trade skills here:
ygData.messageBody:
Fletching can be fun but it takes a lot of money, you can find more
information on fletching and other trade skills here:

http://www.eqtraders.com/learn/learn_fletching.htm

It's generally cheaper to buy bows and arrows from merchants than fletch
them. The best bows and arrows are fletched, but they're expensive to
make.

- Christina

On Fri, 8 Nov 2002, Brangvyne Accampo wrote:

> Salutations All!
>
> After wandering all over Nerrath and collecting up
> various things and returning them to the head ranger I
> was given 15 gold and a treant bow staff thingy. OK,
> what do I do with this, or rather since I'm pretty
> sure I can make a bow with it how would I go about
> doing that? Can anyone help or give suggestions on
> this?
>
> Thanks,
> :o)
> Bran
